entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Ability to specify another package manager for JavaScript SDK projects #44516
  • dotnet-watch - using Process.Kill(false) hangs tests on Linux/OSx #44496

Closed

  • Question: Is the 9.0.100 daily build the final SDK? #44512
  • `dotnet build` ignores `/v` verbosity flag in .NET 9.0.0-preview.7 #43069
  • unable to execute the dotnet new mvc command in git #32874
  • #if MONOANDROID preprocessor is not available in .NET 7 project. #33136
  • The library hostfxr.dll was found, but loading it from C:\Program Files\dotnet\host\fxr\7.0.4\hostfxr.dll failed #31304
  • Cannot enumerate VS workloads on ARM64 (exception in `dotnet --info`) #31552
  • `dotnet restore -v:n` doesn't show the log #42835
  • global tools do not work #43171
  • ArgumentOutOfRangeException Thrown by dotnet tool install #43651
    9.0.2xx
  • dotnet tool install with workaround NUGET_CERT_REVOCATION_MODE does no longer work #44123
  • sdk style project with .net framework 3.5 got incorrect result in VS2022 17.2.6(mscorlib.dll and nlp files copied) #26685
  • [NETSDKE2E]With net9RTM SDK installed, install wasm-toos/maui/aspire failed with error "Workload installation failed: Workload manifest dependency 'Microsoft.NET.Workload.Emscripten.Current' version '9.0.0-rtm.24513.1' is lower than version '9.0.0'" #44217
  • During the installation of .NET 9.0 RC2 SDK, some MAUI manifests still remain 9.0 Preview 6 #43447
  • Build should fail or warn if a project uses features not supported by the build SDK #2557
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [FIX] tool-update: Compare tool versions correctly #44517
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Rename the source build SmokeTests to just source build tests #44514
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update tfm of dotnet/format test project to current #44498
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Update targeting and runtime packs for net9.0 TFM #44508
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Backport: add signature VerifySigning for dotnet tools (#39268) #43060
    Area-Tools, 9.0.2xx
  • Default sign to false for all SB legs #44489
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix .NET Framework test helix submission #44481
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Run MoveDotNetBuildLogs target even when the repo build fails #44480
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Update the sdk target to net10.0 #43015
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [ADD] dotnet solution migrate #44419
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Aspire notifications #44348
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat
  • Gather test diag logging to track down nuget issue #44455
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Better structure VMR join points for resolvers #44428
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • add `dotnet new sln --format slnx` #44469
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove additional TL characters from the dotnet run output special casing for tests #44442
    Area-Infrastructure, Branch Lockdown
  • [FIX] tool-install: Use RestoreActionConfig options #44487
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Add support for using Digest for base image #44461
    untriaged, Area-Containers
